name: Legendary Arcane 2 Universe
description:
Legendary Arcane 2 Universe is an adventure game with 32 Pieces of equipment, more than 20 spells., a levelling system, unlockable skills., over 40 secrets to discover and 8 unique bosses. There are four difficulty modes in the game. Even the easy mode can be challenging so the Insane mode is only for the most hardcore gamer.

“Legendary Arcane Magical Arena with 4 player mode included.”
